content: शब्दः [शब्द्-घञ्] {@--1@} Sound (the object of the sense of hearing and property of आकाश); अथात्मनः शब्दगुणं गुणजः पदं विमानेन विगाहमानः <ls>R. 13. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Sound, note (of birds; men &c.), noise in general; विश्वासोपगमादभिन्नगतयः शब्दं सहंते मृगाः <ls>Ś. 1. 14</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 13</ls>; <ls>Ś. 3. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 31</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 45.</ls> {@--3@} The sound of a musical instrument; वाद्यशब्दः <ls>Pt. 2</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 45.</ls> {@--4@} A word, sound, significant word (for def. &c. see <ls>Mbh.</ls> introduction); एकः शब्दः सम्यगधीतः सम्यक् प्रयुक्तः स्वर्गे लोके कामधुग्भवति; so शब्दार्थौ. {@--5@} A declinable word, a noun, substantive. {@--6@} A title, an epithet; यस्यार्थयुक्तं गिरिराजशब्दं कुर्वंति ब लव्यजनैश्चमर्यः <ls>Ku. 1. 13</ls>; <ls>Ś. 2. 14</ls>; नृपेण चक्रे युवराजशब्दभाक् <ls>R. 3. 35</ls>, <ls n="R.">2. 53</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">64</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 49</ls>, <ls n="R.">5. 22</ls>; <ls n="R.">18. 42</ls>; <ls>V. 1. 1.</ls> {@--7@} The name, mere-name; as in शब्दपति <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--8@} Verbal authority (regarded by the Naiyāyikas as a Pramāṇa). {@--9@} Grammar.
